textBox.richText: After 4 years in the biometrics group at Idiap, Chris is finally going back to Australia where he obtained a research position. Chris was a real asset to the team, and I will never be able to thank him so much for its great work during MOBIO and more recently for his investigations on Session Variability Modeling, Joint Factor Analysis and Probabilistic Linear Discriminant Analysis. Again Chris thank you and all the best for the future. I will see you again sometime somewhere.
